In rerun::sdk::external::re_data_loader

Function rerun::sdk::external::re_data_loader::register_custom_data_loader

source · 
pub fn register_custom_data_loader(loader: impl DataLoader + 'static)
Expand description

Register a custom DataLoader.

Any time the Rerun Viewer opens a file or directory, this custom loader will be notified. Refer to DataLoader’s documentation for more information.
